long_description: The bambu Scarf-n-Scrape utensil set includes a small spork and a pot scraper so you can chow down on your camp meal and quickly clean up afterwards. Spork and scraper are handcrafted from single pieces of certified organic bamboo; naturally stain resistant and antimicrobial. Scraper has a different shape in each corner to get into a variety of spots on your pots and pans; removes stubborn foods without scratching cooking surfaces. Spork is lightweight and strong. Bamboo wood has a natural food-safe oil finish. Clean the bambu Scarf-n-Scrape utensil set in hot soapy water and wipe dry; not recommended for dishwasher or prolonged soaking.
short_description: The bambu Scarf-n-Scrape utensil set includes a small spork and a pot scraper so you can chow down on your camp meal and quickly clean up afterwards.
